TestCase.name: testNestedProject
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[id, deepNested.nested1.name AS nestedName, nested.value AS nestedValue, deepNested.nested2.flag AS nestedFlag, deepNested.nested2.num AS nestedNum]) StreamExecTableSourceScan(table=[[T, source: [TestSource(read nested fields: id.*, deepNested.*, nested.*, name.*)]]], fields=[id, deepNested, nested, name])

TestCase.name: testProcTimeTableSourceOverWindow
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[id, name, w0$o0 AS valSum], where=[>(w0$o0, 100)]) StreamExecOverAggregate(partitionBy=[id], orderBy=[pTime ASC], window=[ RANG BETWEEN 7200000 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW], select=[id, pTime, val, name, SUM(val) AS w0$o0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[id]]) StreamExecTableSourceScan(table=[[procTimeT]], fields=[id, pTime, val, name])

TestCase.name: testProcTimeTableSourceSimple
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[PROCTIME(pTime) AS pTime, id, name, val]) StreamExecTableSourceScan(table=[[procTimeT]], fields=[id, pTime, val, name])

TestCase.name: testProjectWithMapping
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[name, rtime, val]) StreamExecTableSourceScan(table=[[T, source: [TestSource(physical fields: p-rtime, p-id, p-name, p-val)]]], fields=[id, rtime, val, ptime, name])

TestCase.name: testProjectWithoutRowtime
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[PROCTIME(ptime) AS ptime, name, val, id]) StreamExecTableSourceScan(table=[[T, source: [TestSource(physical fields: id, name, val, rtime)]]], fields=[id, rtime, val, ptime, name])

TestCase.name: testProjectWithRowtimeProctime
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[name, val, id]) StreamExecTableSourceScan(table=[[T, source: [TestSource(physical fields: id, name, val, rtime)]]], fields=[id, rtime, val, ptime, name])

TestCase.name: testRowTimeTableSourceGroupWindow
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[name, TMP_0, TMP_1]) StreamExecGroupWindowAggregate(groupBy=[name], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w, 'rowtime, 600000.millis)], properties=[TMP_0], select=[name, AVG(val) AS TMP_1, end('w) AS TMP_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[name]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[rowtime, val, name], where=[>(val, 100)]) StreamExecTableSourceScan(table=[[rowTimeT]], fields=[id, rowtime, val, name])

TestCase.name: testStreamFilterableSourceScanPlan
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[price, id, amount], where=[<(*(price, 2), 32)]) StreamExecTableSourceScan(table=[[filterableTable, source: [filter=['amount > 2]]]], fields=[name, id, amount, price])

TestCase.name: testStreamFilterableSourceWithTrim
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[name, id, amount, price], where=[OR(=(TRIM(FLAG(BOTH), ' ', name), 'Test'), =(TRIM(FLAG(TRAILING), ' ', name), 'Test '), =(TRIM(FLAG(LEADING), ' ', name), ' Test'), =(TRIM(FLAG(BOTH), ' ', name), 'Test'))]) StreamExecTableSourceScan(table=[[filterableTable]], fields=[name, id, amount, price])

TestCase.name: testStreamProjectableSourceScanNoIdentityCalc
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecTableSourceScan(table=[[csvTable, source: [selectedFields=[id, score, first]]]], fields=[id, score, first])

TestCase.name: testStreamProjectableSourceScanPlanSQL
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[last, FLOOR(id) AS EXPR$1, *(score, 2) AS EXPR$2]) StreamExecTableSourceScan(table=[[csvTable, source: [selectedFields=[last, id, score]]]], fields=[last, id, score])

TestCase.name: testStreamProjectableSourceScanPlanTableApi
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[last, FLOOR(id) AS _c1, *(score, 2) AS _c2]) StreamExecTableSourceScan(table=[[csvTable, source: [selectedFields=[last, id, score]]]], fields=[last, id, score])

TestCase.name: testTableSourceWithTimestampRowTimeField
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[rowtime, id, name, val]) StreamExecTableSourceScan(table=[[rowTimeT]], fields=[id, rowtime, val, name])

TestCase.name: testTableSourceWithLongRowTimeField
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[rowtime, id, name, val]) StreamExecTableSourceScan(table=[[rowTimeT]], fields=[id, rowtime, val, name])

TestCase.name: testWithPkMultiRowUpdate
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[pk], select=[pk, COUNT(a) AS TMP_0, COUNT(c) AS TMP_1]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[pk]]) StreamExecLastRow(key=[pk], select=[a, pk, c]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[pk]]) StreamExecTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable]], fields=[a, pk, c])

StreamExecGroupAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecLastRow(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecTableSourceScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testWithPkMultiRowUpdateTransposWithCalc
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[pk], select=[pk, COUNT(a) AS TMP_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[pk]]) StreamExecLastRow(key=[pk], select=[pk, a]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[pk]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[pk, a]) StreamExecTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable]], fields=[a, pk, c])

StreamExecGroupAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecLastRow(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecCalc(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecTableSourceScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc])
